tool_description: IP to Detail provide you 14 different information about an IP address provided, to know from where it is and many more in JSON format.
name: IP to Detail
title: IP to Detail

api_list.name: Get IP Address Details
api_list.description: By using this you will get 14 different parameters explaining details of the IP in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-to-detail.p.rapidapi.com/111.111.111.11"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-to-detail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-to-detail.p.rapidapi.com/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-to-detail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
